product_name: Witz Keep It Clear Sport Case
long_description: Protect small ultra-valuable items like credit cards, ID cards, cash and keys with this small yet highly versatile Keep It Clear waterproof case. Case is 250% larger than Witz's See It Safe Sport Case. Waterproof design provides protection that no wallet can match. Built for outdoor activities or travel, this case can fit into a pocket, attach to a backpack or belt or hang around your neck. Translucent color lets you see contents. Nylon lanyard with breakaway clip.
short_description: Protect small ultra-valuable items like credit cards, ID cards, cash and keys with this small yet highly versatile Keep It Clear waterproof case.
